name: Hiveswap Fansim - Volume Two: Of Stardom, Suns or Otherwise
name_original: Hiveswap Fansim - Volume Two: Of Stardom, Suns or Otherwise
description:
Is there STILL a hole in your heart where Friendsim once was? Do you crave that friend-making experience YET AGAIN? Never fear - Hiveswap Fansim: Volume 2 is here! Two new friends to meet, two more routes to play - plus, Volume ??? is included in this download! Four friends for the price of none - what more could you ask for in a video game?

Coding by @noisyrobo on Twitter

Writing by @Schgain on Twitter

Music by @ectobiolobaby on Tumblr

Art by @noisyrobo, @Schgain, and @poliaths_art on Twitter

Hiveswap and Hiveswap Friendsim are owned by What Pumpkin and we claim no ownership of the core game or assets used from the core game.
